history.content:
You can, however, since you are signing up for classes now, you won't have major priority to enroll or waitlist for CS upper divs, and will have to wait until phase 2 to sign up. More about enrollment policies here. 

It is doable, though there are courses that you may want to carefully schedule so that your workload is not too heavy. I recommend to come meet with one of us to plan out a schedule, link for booking appointments with us here:

lilyzhang.youcanbook.me

cdhughes.youcanbook.me

hunn.youcanbook.me (unavailable until 4/18)

Can I declare CS in summer and then start taking upper division CS courses in Fall ? 

I will take CS 70 this summer ,which is the last prereq. for declaring CS. I am a junior transfer in Fall 2015 as an Economics major. Besides Econ141/140, I finished all the required courses for Economics. I am planning to spend my senior year in finishing CS as my second major.

Is it doable ? Is there anything that I have to aware of ? 

Thanks.
history.subject: Can I declare CS in summer and then start taking upper division CS courses in Fall ?
